backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend for a legal services site, including jurisdiction/status enums, contact form submission types, chatbot Q&A data, and associated CRUD/query logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping completed feature IDs (tagline change, chatbot removal, legal banner restore, team section removal, Cyberabad rename) to their affected frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and recent changes of every component, page, hook, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app, including Google Tag Manager and AMP Analytics script tags, with a single #root div and the main.tsx module entry point.
frontend/public/google2b25be66b928ef08.h: Google Search Console site verification file containing the verification token for thejurists.in.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers full site access and pointing to the sitemap at https://thejurists.in/sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static XML sitemap listing all public URLs for thejurists.in including home, about, services, blog, contact, and jurisdiction pages with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router app setup registering all routes including jurisdiction pages, legacy Cyberabad redirects to MedchalMalkajgiri, Telangana High Court route, and admin/leads routes, with ChatbotWidget removed.
frontend/src/components/BacklinkSubmissi: Empty file with no content; likely a placeholder for a backlink submission panel component.
frontend/src/components/Breadcrumbs.tsx: Breadcrumb navigation component that renders a linked trail with chevron separators and injects JSON-LD breadcrumb structured data for SEO.
frontend/src/components/ChatbotWidget.ts: A floating chat widget component that renders a toggleable chat panel with message history, typing indicator, quick suggestion buttons, and keyboard input, using the useChatbot hook for state management.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Renders a consultation request card that embeds a Google Form via iframe, with a configurable URL prop defaulting to a hardcoded Google Forms link.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class-based error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays an alert with error details, plus 'Try Again' and 'Go Home' recovery buttons.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders an accordion-based FAQ section from a list of question/answer pairs, and injects FAQ structured data (JSON-LD) via the StructuredData component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAdminBut: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site-wide footer with brand info, contact details, quick navigation links, and a list of practice area links, built with TanStack Router's Link component.
frontend/src/components/GoogleSearchCons: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with a logo, desktop navigation including hover-activated dropdowns for Services and Jurisdictions, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a legal notice banner, header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LegalNoticeBanne: A dismissible top banner displaying a Bar Council of India legal disclaimer about the informational nature of the site.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A non-dismissible modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/PromotionalGuida: Empty file with no content or exports.
Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/SEOContentIdeasP: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: A headless component that imperatively updates document title, meta description, keywords, canonical link, Open Graph, and Twitter Card tags via useEffect.
frontend/src/components/StructuredData.t: React component that injects JSON-LD structured data scripts into the document head, plus helper functions to generate LocalBusiness, Organization, and LegalService schema objects for The Jurists law firm.
frontend/src/components/TrafficEngagemen: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatbot.ts: Custom hook managing chatbot state and message history, sending user messages to the backend actor via a React Query mutation and appending bot responses or error messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, contact form submissions, admin checks, and blog articles with appropriate caching and invalidation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Playfair Display and Lato fonts, defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and a fadeIn animation utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page for The Jurists law firm displaying the firm's story, values, and practice areas, with SEO metadata and LocalBusiness structured data injected into the head.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog article fetched by ID, including SEO metadata, structured data, breadcrumbs, category label, author/date meta, and article content with a loading skeleton and not-found fallback.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog articles with category filter tabs, loading skeletons, and an empty state; fetches articles via a query hook and navigates to detail pages on click.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with office info cards, a contact form component, SEO/structured data tags, and a location image placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleVerificationPag: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Google site verification page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with a hero section, practice area cards, highlights grid, SEO head, and structured data for the local business.
frontend/src/pages/InitializeAdminPage.t: Provides a one-time admin setup UI that checks initialization status, prompts Internet Identity login if needed, and calls the initialize access control mutation before redirecting to the leads dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/JurisdictionPage.tsx: Reusable page component that renders jurisdiction-specific content (court name, description, highlights, image) for Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, or Medchal Malkajgiri, with SEO head and breadcrumbs.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page that displays, filters, and exports contact form submissions as a table, with status update functionality and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Dynamic detail page for individual legal services, rendering title, description, features, and SEO metadata based on a URL slug mapped to static service data.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Overview page listing all available legal services as a grid of cards with images, descriptions, and navigation links to individual service detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/TelanganaHighCourtPag: SEO-optimized landing page for the firm's Telangana High Court practice, highlighting writ petitions, appeals, and constitutional matters with structured data and breadcrumbs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with CSS-variable-based colors, custom serif/sans fonts, luxury box shadows, and fade-in animation, plus animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 3) for a legal services website, documenting existing features, known issues, architectural notes, and requirements such as tagline updates, banner restoration, and jurisdiction renaming from 'Cyberabad' to 'Medchal Malkajgiri and Kukatpally Courts'.
